rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0001
rows.name:
The interior of this Divine Beast
battleship is pretty different
from the Monoceros, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0002
rows.name: What's Monoceros?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0003
rows.name:
Rex, you saw it, didn't you?
It was moored at one of the
Goldmund docks, remember?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0004
rows.name:
It's that black ship
belonging to Shin's group.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, that amazing one!
It's not powered by
a Divine Beast, is it?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0006
rows.name:
I don't know the details, but...
it seems that way.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0007
rows.name:
Amazing!!
Tora wants to see it too!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0008
rows.name:
You probably won't get a chance
to see it... not unless
we run into those Iira guys again.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0009
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-meh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0010
rows.name: Tora change mind. No need to see.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0011
rows.name:
Masterpon, you change
your mind too quickly.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0012
rows.name:
The Monoceros was impressive,
but this Divine Beast battleship
is quite something too!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0013
rows.name:
Right?
It's full of things
I've never seen before.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0014
rows.name:
This Divine Beast warship
is the crystallization of the
Superbian Empire's latest technology!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0015
rows.name:
Regular civilians aren't
even permitted to step
foot inside!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0016
rows.name:
Even if you call it
the latest technology, it's just using
salvaged technology, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0017
rows.name:
...Actually,
it looks like they've made some
unique modifications to it.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0018
rows.name:
See that device embedded there?
It's been modified so extensively you
can't even tell what it was originally.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0019
rows.name:
That's a control panel that
transmits signals to the
Divine Beast's nervous system.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0020
rows.name:
They run cables from here to different
parts of the Divine Beast to control
the flow of different information types.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0021
rows.name: Wow... That's pretty impressive.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0022
rows.name:
This cable itself is 2.4 times
faster with 12 times the capacity
of conventional ones.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0023
rows.name:
In other words, it on whole other level
to stuff other countries use!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0024
rows.name:
So if we installed this
on a smaller Divine Beast vessel,
it would be incredibly efficient!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0025
rows.name: Ahem, that's right!!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0026
rows.name:
Those two seem to be having
a great time, but I don't understand
a word they're saying.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0027
rows.name: What do you think, Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0028
rows.name: How should I answer, meh?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0029
rows.name: Those two still have a lot to learn.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0030
rows.name: Why is Masterpon bragging about this?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0101
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0102
rows.name:
Hana has a wide variety
of knowledge stored
in her memory.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0103
rows.name:
Thanks to Masterpon's interests,
I'm particularly well-versed
in mechanical systems.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0104
rows.name:
That's why I can easily follow
what those two are talking about.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0105
rows.name:
Actually, if I got serious,
I could talk even more passionately
than those two.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0106
rows.name: I-I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0107
rows.name: I feel kind of out of place...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0108
rows.name: Don't worry about it, Nia.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0109
rows.name:
I can also have an engaging
conversation about your
favorite insect dishes.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0110
rows.name: You're too kind...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0111
rows.name:
But just so you know,
I don't like insects,
I prefer fish dishes.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0112
rows.name: I-I'm sorry.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0113
rows.name:
I'll update my database right away.
Masterpon wasn't very careful with the 
settings, so there are occasional errors.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0114
rows.name:
Tora...!
Who did you say
likes eating bugs...?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0115
rows.name: Meh-meh! I sense dangerous hostility...!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0116
rows.name:
Boss, we should quickly move on!
It's dangerous to stay here!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0117
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0118
rows.name: Come on, come on, let's hurry!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0201
rows.name: Hehe! I'm so glad you asked!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0202
rows.name:
The technology used in this Divine Beast
warship is actually also used in Hana's
power source and drive system!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0203
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I'm surprised!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0204
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Moreover, moreover,
Hana's is further improved
and incorporated

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0205
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Even more surprising!!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0206
rows.name:
...Could it be that you stole
the Empire's technology?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0207
rows.name:
Listen, Tora,
isn't that really risky?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0208
rows.name:
In the name of scientific progress,
some risks are necessary...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0209
rows.name:
But the system I've built into Hana
is so advanced that even Superbian
engineers couldn't reverse-engineer it!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0210
rows.name:
There's absolutely
nothing to worry about!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0211
rows.name:
Hana became a little anxious
after hearing the secret
story of her birth...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0212
rows.name: D-don't worry! Probably...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0213
rows.name:
Come on, Boss!
Let's stop chatting
and get moving!
